A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Too many plot holes (one story line is a complete dead end\, and another would have been over in 5mins if they attacked the rebel ship that was out of gas with tie fighters. And this doesn’t even count Rey somehow being a Jedi with no actual training of any kind). Mishandling of both Luke and Leia. If you have any love of the original 3 movies this movie will be a disappointment.
